<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 498, 478, 511]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 514, 361, 527]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 577, 666, 608]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[156, 875, 725, 909]]<|/det|>
\[
\begin{array}{lll}
\mathrm{f}(x)=2 x-1 & \mathrm{~g}(x)=3 x+2 & \mathrm{~h}(x)=\frac{1}{x}, x \neq 0 \\
\mathrm{j}(x)=x^{2}
\end{array}
\]
